name: smart-saver-backend

scripts.postinstall: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); const path = require('path'); const fs = require('fs'); const ytDlpDir = path.join(__dirname, 'yt-dlp'); if (!fs.existsSync(ytDlpDir)) { fs.mkdirSync(ytDlpDir, { recursive: true }); } const ytDlpPath = path.join(ytDlpDir, 'yt-dlp'); try { execSync('curl -L https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp -o ' + ytDlpPath, {stdio: 'inherit'}); execSync('chmod +x ' + ytDlpPath, {stdio: 'inherit'}); console.log('yt-dlp installed successfully to: ' + ytDlpPath); } catch(e) { console.log('yt-dlp installation failed during build, will retry at runtime'); }"

author: Smart Saver Team
description: Backend API for Smart Saver video downloader app
